ie.gmit.sw.controller

Class ClassHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.controller.ClassHandler

  • public class ClassHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides reflection API functionality. It consists of methods that retrieves information about classes.

      • getSuperClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> getSuperClass(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                                        ClassSet classSetClasses)
        This method checks if a class has a superclass that isn't the class Object
        Parameters:
        cls - A class is passed to the method
        classSetClasses - A ClassSet type is passed to the method
        Returns:
        If a superclass is present then return that superclass. Otherwise return null.
